Power_Bolt.help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.
Power_Bolt.targetHelp: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

Power_Burst.help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

Power_Thrust.help: A focused attack that violently shoves the target and sends him flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Power_Thrust.targetHelp: A powerful thrust from the Ballista that does smashing and energy damage and knocks you back.

Nova.help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Nova.shortHelp: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback, Self -Recovery

Total_Focus.help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
